data.name: QuickMatrix
data.detailed_description:
The QuickMatrix to solve your following problems:
  • Open a bunch of folders, and it take a long time to find the folder you want to see;
  • You need to open various folders frequently, and it take a long time to click the path everytime;
  • A bunch of windows are opened on the desktop, and any icons on the desktop cannot be clicked at all;
  • After pressing Win+D to return to the desktop and operating , the previous windows cannot be returned by Win+D;
  • Know how to use the Win Quick Launch Bar, but a large number of the same icons cannot be distinguished;

In view of the above pain points, this tool can achieve the following functions:
  • Click the button to start the corresponding program/folder;
  • Topmost and only occupy a little size, the minimum size is only 60*7 pixels;
  • You can display or hide, and fold or expand the window with hotkey;
  • Directly drag the file or folder into the program to add quickly;
  • Customize the window layout, drag the button position at will;
  • Customize button displaying text or icon, customize button text color or background color;
  • Customize programs's hotkey and buttons's hotkeys;
  • Mouse up the button to view the detailed path and hotkey;
  • Take easy to run as administrator and set it run always as administrator;
  • The program can be set to start at boot, put it in the position you are used to, and it will always be there;

This tool has been promoted and used in the department and has been widely praised. It has greatly increased work efficiency and made it possible to find things with one click.
Put it on the Steam to let everyone experience this convenient tool together.

Please leave your praise if you can, your praise is the greatest encouragement to me!

data.short_description: The QuickMatrix tool makes it possible for you to find files and folders with one click. You don't have to worry about huge number of folders and files, and you don't have to worry about the new tool blocking your desktop. Come and use it to increase your efficiency.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: None
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: None
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
